mapper.select: SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID , TB_LOCAL.PASSWORD , TB_MEMBER.EMAIL , TB_MEMBER.ROLE , TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME , TB_MEMBER.NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER INNER JOIN TB_LOCAL ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = TB_LOCAL.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_MEMBER.EMAIL = #{email} AND TB_MEMBER.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID , TB_MEMBER.EMAIL , TB_LOCAL.PASSWORD , TB_MEMBER.ROLE , TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME , TB_MEMBER.NICKNAME FROM TB_MEMBER INNER JOIN TB_LOCAL ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = TB_LOCAL.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TB_MEMBER.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, MBTI = #{mbti}, GENDER = #{gender}, MEMBER_JOB = #{job}, WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET JOB = #{job}, GENDER = #{gender}, GENRE = #{genre} , NICKNAME= #{nickName}, PHONE =#{phone} WHERE MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PHONE = #{phone}, MBTI = #{mbti}, MEMBER_JOB = #{job}, GENDER = #{gender}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT TB_SOCIAL.MEMBER_ID , TB_SOCIAL.PROVIDER , TB_MEMBER.EMAIL , TB_MEMBER.ROLE FROM TB_MEMBER INNER JOIN TB_SOCIAL ON TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = TB_SOCIAL.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TB_MEMBER.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, MBTI, MEMBER_JOB, GENDER ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{email}, #{name}, 'TEMP', 'TEMP', 'UNKNOWN', 'UNKNOWN', 'U' )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID , MBTI AS mbti, MEMBER_JOB AS job, GENDER AS gender, MEMBER_NAME AS name, NICKNAME AS nickName, PHONE AS phone, EMAIL AS email,MG.GENRE_ID, GENRE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_MEMBER_GENRE MG ON M.MEMBER_ID = MG.MEMBER_ID JOIN TB_GENRE G ON MG.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
